page.title: 20Peterlee _ Credits & Thanks.
page.content: Contributors to this entry have been: Teachers: Mr.D.Hewitson,Mr.R.Hanney, Mrs.A.Williamson{(Acre Rigg Juniors); Mr.G.McAlroy,Mrs.I.Osborne{(Our Lady {of the Rosary Jun.);}Mr.R.Winter{(Eden {Hall Juniors);}and staff from{St. Bede {Comprehensive. Children : Clare Breckon,Wendy Fox, Marie Hepworth,Maria Wilkinson,Julie Benson,Kathryn Benson,Nina Barton, Richard Crawford,Ann-Marie Wilson, Helen Maddocks{(Acre Rigg Juniors); Joanne Selby,Zoey Matthews,Janina Wright,Kevin Soulsby,Steven Adams, Alison Corfield{(Eden Hall Juniors);} Amanda Payne,Lisa Waister,Brian Kamara Claire Gardner,Amanda Archibald,Joanne Mearman,Josephine Cain,Honor Murphy{ {(Our Lady Of The Rosary Juniors).} Our grateful thanks also to{Peterlee {Development Corporation}for their help in the amenities count and survey.
